mapper.select: /* member.getMemberByBusinessNumber */ SELECT MEMBERID, STARTBUSINESSDESIREYN, FRANCHISEJOINYN, ITEM, PHONENUMBER, PHONENUMBER2, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, BIRTHDAY, APPENGAGEDATE, ESEROEXTRACT, BEFORESALES, LASTCONSULTDATE, AVAILABLEMONEY, BUSINESSTYPE, MEMBERNAME, BUSINESSNUMBER, GENDER, MEMBERTYPE, ESEROJOINYN, TAXACCOUNTACCEPTYN, OPENDATE, ISDELETED, CREATIONDATE, MODIFICATIONDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE BUSINESSNUMBER = #{businessNumber}
